name: A World That Matters
description:
A World That Matters is  an Incremental/Clicker space game where you build your own Universe!

GENERATE MATTER!

and with it create new tools to generate more and MORE!

Grow your univerase bigger as new stars come to orbit the heavier you are.

With enough matter you can unleash cool events!

More content comming.

Thank you for stoping by!
